name: Escape from the Usual Room: a KFP Fan Game
name_original: Escape from the Usual Room: a KFP Fan Game
description:
Latest Version Notes: Release! Happy Birthday Takanashi Kiara! July 6, 2022!

You can change the difficulty between Easy, Normal, Hard and "Nope" in the Settings Menu. 

Harder difficulty will have a larger escape distance, but it will have a higher score multiplier!

Fever Night Mode: Chill with this remix of Takanashi Kiara's 4th Single Fever Night go for maximum distance and high score in this chill alternative mode! STREAM FEVER NIGHT!

You are KFP Employee [redacted] resident of Usual Room 101. Smol Ame has come to help you in your escape! Quick! Chimkin! Run! Before Tenchou realizes you've escaped!

Inspired by Takanashi Kiara of hololive English and the KFP Fanbase

I am not affiliated with hololive.

If you wish to support me, check out my Ko-fi.

Permissions:

You are allowed to to create videos, upload or stream on YouTube or other video sites, and monetize those videos and streams.

Controls:

All you need is a mouse, or if you want to try embedded on mobile, your fingers.

The game also supports:

Keyboard: Space Bar/Enter keys for power and angle inputs. Up and Right Arrows keys or W and A keys for Boosters.

Any Controller: Any of the 4 face buttons for power and angle inputs. D-Pad Up/Right and Control Stick Up/Right for Boosters.
